Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 50th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2016...
Injured on 4/23/2017 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/13/2018 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 4/6/2019 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Kansas City to Houston on 2/10/2022 (Going to KC: P Leo Cortez. Going to HOU: 2B Lucio Quijano, SS Philip Davies)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2022, off Leo Cortez (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/7/2022, off Carl Plascencia (CHI)...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 6/9/2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2022, hitting .522 with 0 HR, 13 RBI...
Injured on 8/18/2022 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2023, hitting .433 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 5/17/2023...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2023...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
